HEA_composition.composition: Elemental compositions determined by EDS, specific ratios not provided
HEA_composition.crystal_structure: Phase transforms from FCC to BCC with increasing elements (e.g., upon Cr addition)
HEA_composition.average_particle_size_nm: 33–44 nm (size distribution provided in Figure S5)
HEA_composition.support: Dispersed on the surface of balsawood substrates to form HEA-BW composite evaporator

synthesis.precursors: No specific precursors or exact amounts were mentioned

mixing_entropy.note: Entropy > 1.5R (12.47 J mol⁻¹ K⁻¹) for ≥5 elements defines high-entropy alloys

photothermal_evaporation_performance.long_term_stability: Stable evaporation rate over 10 cycles in 20 wt% brine with no salt accumulation
photothermal_evaporation_performance.outdoor_performance: Stable freshwater production under natural sunlight over 14 days

photothermal_mechanism.primary_mechanism: d-d interband transitions (IBTs) in 3d transition metals
photothermal_mechanism.explanation: The fully filled energy regions around the Fermi level due to multiple 3d transition metals broaden optical absorption across the solar spectrum, enhancing photothermal conversion.
